data.title: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble's Relationship Timeline and How They Met
meta_keywords: Kris Jenner Corey Gamble relationship timeline
Kris Jenner Corey Gamble relationship explainer
data.meta_description: A deep-dive into Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble's relationship‚Äîincluding how they met and how long they've been dating.
data.text:
Kris Jenner spends much of her time problem-solving her children's non-stop drama and single-handedly managing pretty much every member of her family. But when she's not dealing with all those shenanigans, Kris spends time with her long-time boyfriend Corey Gamble! Korey (a shipper name I just invented because no one bothered to do it before me) goes back all the way to 2014, a simpler time when the words "dolce vita wedding" didn't make us shudder in fear. Let's get into it.

August 2014

Otherwise known as the fateful month Kris and Corey met. The place? Ibiza. The time? Who knows, but probably true love o'clock. The location? Fashion designer Riccardo Tisci's 40th birthday party, where all fairytale love stories begin.

November 7, 2014

Corey pops up at Kris' birthday party, and this truly outstanding photo‚Äînay, work of art‚Äîis taken:

March 23, 2015

Next, Corey shows up on Keeping Up With the Kardashians, and he and Kris basically spend an entire episode making sweet love all over the house‚Äîcompletely traumatizing Kim Kardashian in the process. "The bed, like, bangs up against the wall," she tells her family in horror. "And I was literally trying to pass out and I, like, woke up and I swear I thought I heard moaning."

April 5, 2015

Corey and Kris are spotted attending an Easter church service together. You know what they say: The couple that prays together, stays together. Or something.

April 23, 2015

Corey and Kris make their relationship Instagram official when they post pics from their double date with (LOL) Billy Ray and Trish Cyrus:

May 2, 2016

Kris brings Corey as her date to the Met Gala! And they look very fancy!

June 26, 2017

People publishes claims from a source alleging that "Kris is basically [Corey's] sugar mama," the "relationship is more business than romantic," and finally, that "they will never get married." All of which is, wow, RUDE, and clearly untrue considering their vibes keep on keeping on.

October 2017

Rumors surface that Kris and Corey have broken up thanks to the below Instagram from Kim, which she originally captioned, "Caption this.... mine is SWF." (She then changes the caption to "Caption this...")

January 15, 2018

An episode of KUWTK airs where Kris is caught between Corey and Khlo√© Kardashian, who apparently aren't getting along super well. "I like all of y‚Äôall, but y‚Äôall are girls," Corey says. "I‚Äôm a dude and I know how that shit can go. I‚Äôm a young dude dating your mom. Y‚Äôall are not really my fucking kids. We are technically peers."

May 7, 2018

Corey and Kris hit up the Met Gala again!

August 7, 2018

After being spotted with a diamond on that finger, Kris is asked point-blank by James Corden if she's engaged...annnnnd she refuses to answer, saying, "No, I‚Äôm not gonna answer. This isn‚Äôt the ring." Naturally, this prompts James Corden to say, "But there is a ring," and Kris Jenner casually eats a cricket to avoid talking to him.

September 16, 2018

On the podcast Divorce Sucks With Laura Wasser, Kris says she probably won't ever get married to Corey, explaining:

"You know, you never say never, but I often say it‚Äôs just not what I think I need to do again based on my past. I‚Äôm in a really great relationship right now, and I‚Äôm happy and I don‚Äôt want to mess that up. I don‚Äôt have the need to put on a long, white dress and walk down an aisle. I‚Äôve done that. I‚Äôve had the big wedding, I‚Äôve had the babies and the kids‚Äîsix of them, by the way. It‚Äôs not like we need to do that again; my body wouldn‚Äôt cooperate if I wanted it to. I think that I just feel really grateful and blessed for my past experiences and I‚Äôm looking forward to my future and I just don‚Äôt think that I want to go there."

November 5, 2018

Kris and Corey celebrate her birthday with a cuddly Instagram photo.

May 6, 2019

It's the Met Gala and the theme is CAMP, bb:

October 1, 2019

Kris and Corey hit up Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber's wedding (obviously, celeb photo booths were absolutely peaking during this era).

November 10, 2019

And then they arrive looking v fancy at the People's Choice Awards:

November 5, 2020

Corey celebrates Kris' birthday, writing in part, "I LOVE U so much young sexy ‚ù§Ô∏è üíú it‚Äôs your day my lady." Ooookay!

April 1, 2021

Kris and Corey's extreme horniness has Kourtney Kardasian attempt to get them to do a celibacy trial. Just a normal thing every kid goes through with their mom and stepdad!

September 13, 2021

The Met Gala (held late this year) arrives, and whomst should get an invite? THESE TWO!

November 10, 2021

Kris wishes Corey happy birthday, calling him "the most amazing partner, best friend, confidant, travel aficionado, therapist, problem solver, golf buddy, protector, advisor, and the best, most wonderful man to my kids and my grandkids!!!"

May 2, 2022

It's the Met Gala again, and you KNOW they're invited!

June 12, 2022

Post-Met, these two spend some time sailing around Italy, as one does:

October 31, 2022

We're then blessed with a pic of their somewhat confusing Halloween costume:

July 5, 2023

Due to knowing Queen Bey personally, Kris and Corey attend her shows in both Paris *and* London:

July 11, 2023

And then go on a quick vacation with Ellen and Portia:

August 21, 2023

Honestly, they spend most of the summer yachting around Europe and making everyone jealous:

October 1, 2023

Kris and Corey arrive at Paris Fashion Week looking instantly iconic:

November 25, 2023

Corey and Kris are one of the A-listers who hit up Beyonc√©'s Renaissance movie premiere in London, and ofc, their looks did not disappoint:

January 24, 2024

The couple looked chic as ever as they sat in the front row for Valentino Couture Spring 2024 show at Paris Fashion Week.

March 2, 2024

Kris and Corey pulled up to amfAR's Palm Beach Gala in co-ordinating all-white looks.

March 10, 2024

Aaaand of course, Kris attended Vanity Fair's star-studded Oscars after-party with Corey in a floor-length silver-beaded gown. Her daughters Kendall, Kylie, and Kim were also in attendance, NBD.

Which brings us fully up to date! But don't worry, this timeline will be updated with the next installment of their love story‚Äîbecause following Kris and Corey's relationship isn't a job, it's a blessing.
